0.2.name: wordpress/iphone-theme-switch
0.2.description: This plugin detects if your site is being viewed by iPhone (or iPod) and switches to an, by admin selectable, iPhone theme. THIS WILL BE THE LAST REVISION OF THIS PLUGIN USE THE "MOBILE THEME SWITCH" plugin instead: http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/mobile-theme-switcher/
